FlavorTextOption.Text: A scientist back on our homeworld has discovered a way to greatly increase the efficacy of Hyperdrive systems of all kinds. Unfortunately, he seems bent on sharing this knowledge with all his peers, regardless of their race of origin.
Let him share his work. If all races advance together we need not fear any one of them gaining an advantage. [COLOR=BenevolentBlue](Benevolent +50, +100% Base Moves to everyone's ships)[/COLOR]
I'm sure with a little financial incentive we can make sure this knowledge stays with us alone. [COLOR=PragmaticGold](Pragmatic +25, -2500 Credits, +100% Base Moves to our ships)[/COLOR]
Make sure the fool has an accident. I'm sure our researchers can make something of his notes. [COLOR=WarRed](Malevolent +25, +50% Base Moves to our ships)[/COLOR]
